title: Is There a God? Stephen Hawking Gives the Definitive Answer to the Eternal Question
full_text: Is There a God? Stephen Hawking Gives the Definitive Answer to the Eternal Question. "The universe is the ultimate free lunch.". “Every formula which expresses a law of nature is a hymn of praise to God,” the trailblazing astronomer and leading Figuring figure Maria Mitchell wrote in the second half of the nineteenth century a… [+17187 chars]
